Class DefaultLoggersManager

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.management.endpoint.loggers.impl.DefaultLoggersManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoggersManager<Map<String,Object>>
@Singleton @Requires(beans=LoggersEndpoint.class) public class DefaultLoggersManager extends Object implements LoggersManager<Map<String,Object>>
Default implementation of LoggersManager.
